question.title: The type software.amazon.awssdk.awscore.client.builder.AwsClientBuilder cannot be resolved
question.body:
I'm trying to move a java app from 8 to 21. I built a stand alone app to talk to aws without an issue but if I pull it into my app I'm upgrading I get this error:

The type software.amazon.awssdk.awscore.client.builder.AwsClientBuilder cannot be resolved. It is indirectly referenced from required type 
software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3BaseClientBuilder

Blockquote

From digging it appears it may have something to do with the build path but I don't really know what its trying to tell me. I'm using eclipse and maven.

here is my build path

Not sure how to resolve this as my stand alone app is fine but when I pull it into my larger project this line is causing the error (note my stan alone app does not have a module-info.java file if that matters):

StaticCredentialsProvider provider = StaticCredentialsProvider.create(creds);

I've got these imports:

import software.amazon.awssdk.auth.credentials.AwsBasicCredentials;
import software.amazon.awssdk.auth.credentials.AwsCredentials;
import software.amazon.awssdk.auth.credentials.StaticCredentialsProvider;
import software.amazon.awssdk.regions.Region;
import software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client;

and this in the pom file

<dependency>
    <groupId>software.amazon.awssdk</groupId>
    <artifactId>s3</artifactId>
    <version>2.25.23</version>
</dependency>

as well as this in the module-info.java file

requires software.amazon.awssdk.auth;
requires software.amazon.awssdk.regions;
requires software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3;

I still think I'm missing something but not sure where to look.

question_comments.body: Try to adding requires software.amazon.awssdk.awscore; in your module-info.java.
